column5: Our well appointed backyard cottage is in a beautiful, historic Southside neighborhood. We are centrally located and close to the best of Fort Worth, including the Cultural District, Will Rogers Memorial Coliseum, the hospital district and UNT Medical School. TCU families and fans will find us just blocks from the University. Fort Worth Trinity Parks and bike trails, as well as our renowned Zoo are walking distance, and downtown Sundance Square and concert venues are 10 minutes away.
